summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, transmitting draft motions in limine (MILs) for the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email indicates the documents are being shared for review and comment prior to finalization.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting draft motions in limine for the Ghislaine Maxwell case from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the motions in limine being drafted by the prosecution.

connections.description: The prosecutor is preparing legal motions (MILs) for the case against defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Draft Motions in Limine Prepared
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends draft motions in limine for the Ghislaine Maxwell case to an unspecified recipient for review and comment.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively preparing motions in limine for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial as of October 2021.
The email shows prosecutorial coordination and review processes in the Maxwell case.
The correspondence is professional, seeking feedback on draft legal filings before finalization.
